type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be WindturbineStatus

timestamp.description: Property. Attribute present in data model Complaint of subject dataModel.CallComplaints with the description The timestamp of the Complaint. Attribute present in data model CircuitBreaker of subject dataModel.OCF with the description An RFC3339 formatted time indicating when the data was observed (e.g.: 2016-02-15T09:19Z, 1996-12-19T16:39:57-08:00). Note that 1/100 time resolution should be used. Attribute present in data model PVArrayConnectionTerminal of subject dataModel.OCF with the description An RFC3339 formatted time indicating when the data was observed (e.g.: 2016-02-15T09:19Z, 1996-12-19T16:39:57-08:00). Note that 1/100 time resolution should be used. Attribute present in data model TimeStamp of subject dataModel.OCF with the description An RFC3339 formated time indicating when the data was observed (e.g.: 2016-02-15T09:19Z, 1996-12-19T16:39:57-08:00). Attribute present in data model ITTests of subject dataModel.IT with the description EPOCH timestamp measures in milliseconds corresponding to the starting point of the execution of the tests. Attribute present in data model Inverter of subject dataModel.OCF with the description An RFC3339 formatted time indicating when the data was observed (e.g.: 2016-02-15T09:19Z, 1996-12-19T16:39:57-08:00). Resolution in 1/100 second. Attribute present in data model TransitManagement of subject dataModel.UrbanMobility with the description Last reported time of observation from the vehicle. SameAs: 'timestamp' field from GTFS Realtime message-Vehicleposition (https://developers.google.com/transit/gtfs-realtime/reference#message-vehicleposition). Attribute present in data model TransitManagement of subject dataModel.UrbanMobility with the description Last reported time of observation from the vehicle. SameAs: 'timestamp' field from GTFS Realtime message-Vehicleposition (https://developers.google.com/transit/gtfs-realtime/reference#message-vehicleposition). Attribute present in data model TransitManagement of subject dataModel.UrbanMobility with the description Last reported time of observation from the vehicle. SameAs:  'timestamp' field from GTFS Realtime message-Vehicleposition (https://developers.google.com/transit/gtfs-realtime/reference#message-vehicleposition).
